Use the arrow below the button to insert a Wedge."}},{"key":"Studio.Tutorials.StudioTour2.wedge_Title","source":"Insert a Wedge","values":{"en-us":"Insert a Wedge"}},{"key":"Studio.Tutorials.StudioTour3.wedge_Title","source":"Insert a Wedge","values":{"en-us":"Insert a Wedge"}},{"key":"Studio.Tutorials.Tutorial.Skip","source":"Skip","values":{"en-us":"Skip"}},{"key":"Studio.Tutorials.StudioTour2.welcome_Compliment","source":"Well done!","values":{"en-us":"Well done!"}},{"key":"Studio.Tutorials.StudioTour2.workspace_Title","source":"Workspace","values":{"en-us":"Workspace"}},{"key":"Studio.Tutorials.StudioTour3.anchor_Description","source":"If the ramp isn't Anchored, gravity will cause it to slip off the end of the slide when you playtest.

With the ramp selected, click Anchor.","values":{"en-us":"If the ramp isn't Anchored, gravity will cause it to slip off the end of the slide when you playtest.

With the ramp selected, click Anchor."}},{"key":"Studio.Tutorials.StudioTour3.anchor_Title","source":"Fix the ramp in place","values":{"en-us":"Fix the ramp in place"}},{"key":"Studio.Tutorials.StudioTour3.avatar_Description","source":"Control your avatar with the W, A, S & D keys. Press E to climb into the ball when you are near it. Once you're in the ball, move towards the slide and roll down it!","values":{"en-us":"Control your avatar with the W, A, S & D keys. Press E to climb into the ball when you are near it. Once you're in the ball, move towards the slide and roll down it!"}},{"key":"Studio.Tutorials.StudioTour3.color_Description","source":"With the ramp selected, press the arrow below the button Color and choose a new color.","values":{"en-us":"With the ramp selected, press the arrow below the button Color and choose a new color."}},{"key":"Studio.Tutorials.StudioTour3.playtest2_Title","source":"Time to test","values":{"en-us":"Time to test"}},{"key":"Studio.Tutorials.StudioTour3.complete_Description","source":"Try changing your ramp to another angle, or make it longer or shorter. When you're happy with your ramp and want to complete the tour, press Finish on this window. You can always come back by opening the project again from the Start page.","values":{"en-us":"Try changing your ramp to another angle, or make it longer or shorter. When you're happy with your ramp and want to complete the tour, press Finish on this window. You can always come back by opening the project again from the Start page."}},{"key":"Studio.Tutorials.StudioTour3.explorer_Description","source":"Now that the ramp is complete, it's time to customize the ball. The Explorer displays everything in your place, including built-in services.","values":{"en-us":"Now that the ramp is complete, it's time to customize the ball. The Explorer displays everything in your place, including built-in services."}},{"key":"Studio.Tutorials.StudioTour3.focus_Description","source":"With the Ball selected, press F to move the camera to look at it.","values":{"en-us":"With the Ball selected, press F to move the camera to look at it."}},{"key":"Studio.Tutorials.StudioTour3.insertMarketplace_Description","source":"Click on the ball tile to insert it into your place.","values":{"en-us":"Click on the ball tile to insert it into your place."}},{"key":"Studio.Tutorials.StudioTour3.insertMarketplace_Title","source":"Insert the ball","values":{"en-us":"Insert the ball"}},{"key":"Studio.Tutorials.StudioTour3.intro1_Description","source":"This tutorial will teach you how to create your first Roblox place! You'll learn how to control the camera, add objects to your experience, and playtest with your Roblox avatar.","values":{"en-us":"This tutorial will teach you how to create your first Roblox place! You'll learn how to control the camera, add objects to your experience, and playtest with your Roblox avatar."}},{"key":"Studio.Tutorials.StudioTour3.intro2_Description","source":"Every Roblox project includes a place. This example place contains a carnival scene with a slide game. The aim of the game is to roll down the slide in a ball and hit the target.","values":{"en-us":"Every Roblox project includes a place. This example place contains a carnival scene with a slide game. The aim of the game is to roll down the slide in a ball and hit the target."}},{"key":"Studio.Tutorials.StudioTour3.move_Description","source":"Select the Move tool, then click and drag the blue and red handles to move the ramp to the end of the slide.","values":{"en-us":"Select the Move tool, then click and drag the blue and red handles to move the ramp to the end of the slide."}},{"key":"Studio.Tutorials.StudioTour3.playtest2_Description","source":"Finally, click the Play button to playtest. See if your ramp can get you to the target!","values":{"en-us":"Finally, click the Play button to playtest. See if your ramp can get you to the target!"}},{"key":"Studio.Tutorials.StudioTour3.rotate_Description","source":"Select the Rotate tool, then click and drag the green handle to turn the wedge around so it faces the top of the slide.","values":{"en-us":"Select the Rotate tool, then click and drag the green handle to turn the wedge around so it faces the top of the slide."}},{"key":"Studio.Tutorials.StudioTour3.saveProject_Description","source":"Before you playtest, click Save to save your project so you don't lose your progress. You can open your saved projects from the Start screen.","values":{"en-us":"Before you playtest, click Save to save your project so you don't lose your progress. You can open your saved projects from the Start screen."}},{"key":"Studio.Tutorials.StudioTour3.saveProject_Title","source":"Save your project","values":{"en-us":"Save your project"}},{"key":"Studio.Tutorials.StudioTour3.save_Title","source":"Save your Experience","values":{"en-us":"Save your Experience"}},{"key":"Studio.Tutorials.StudioTour3.scale_Description","source":"Select the Scale tool, then click and drag each of the handles to make the wedge big enough for the ball to roll over.","values":{"en-us":"Select the Scale tool, then click and drag each of the handles to make the wedge big enough for the ball to roll over."}},{"key":"Studio.Tutorials.StudioTour3.searchMarketplace_Description","source":"Let's insert a ball that players can use to roll down the slide. Try typing 'ball' in the search bar.","values":{"en-us":"Let's insert a ball that players can use to roll down the slide. Try typing 'ball' in the search bar."}},{"key":"Studio.Tutorials.StudioTour3.select_Description","source":"The Workspace displays everything in your 3D world. Select the ball in the Workspace.","values":{"en-us":"The Workspace displays everything in your 3D world. Select the ball in the Workspace."}},{"key":"Studio.Tutorials.StudioTour3.select_Title","source":"Select the ball","values":{"en-us":"Select the ball"}},{"key":"Studio.Tutorials.StudioTour3.speed_Description","source":"You can add custom data to objects using attributes. Let's increase the speed of the ball to try and reach the furthest bullseye.

Type 'Speed' in the Filter Properties box to find and update the Speed value and change the speed of the ball.","values":{"en-us":"You can add custom data to objects using attributes. Let's increase the speed of the ball to try and reach the furthest bullseye.

Type 'Speed' in the Filter Properties box to find and update the Speed value and change the speed of the ball."}},{"key":"Studio.Tutorials.StudioTour3.speed_Title","source":"Change Speed","values":{"en-us":"Change Speed"}},{"key":"Studio.Tutorials.StudioTour3.stopPlaytest2_Description","source":"Can you hit the bullseye? When you're ready, press Stop to go back to editing your place.","values":{"en-us":"Can you hit the bullseye? When you're ready, press Stop to go back to editing your place."}},{"key":"Studio.Tutorials.StudioTour3.stopPlaytest2_Title","source":"Finish playtesting","values":{"en-us":"Finish playtesting"}},{"key":"Studio.Tutorials.StudioTour3.stopPlaytest_Description","source":"Looks like the slide isn't quite finished! Let's add a ramp to the end so that players can hit the target when they roll down the slide. When you're ready, press Stop to go back to editing your place.","values":{"en-us":"Looks like the slide isn't quite finished! Let's add a ramp to the end so that players can hit the target when they roll down the slide. When you're ready, press Stop to go back to editing your place."}},{"key":"Studio.Tutorials.StudioTour3.topic_introduction","source":"Introduction","values":{"en-us":"Introduction"}},{"key":"Studio.Tutorials.Tutorial.Back","source":"Back","values":{"en-us":"Back"}},{"key":"Studio.Tutorials.Tutorial.SkipStep","source":"Skip Step","values":{"en-us":"Skip Step"}},{"key":"Studio.Tutorials.Tutorial.StepSkipped","source":"Step Skipped","values":{"en-us":"Step Skipped"}},{"key":"Studio.Tutorials.Tutorial.StopPlaytest_Description","source":"Control your avatar with the W, A, S & D keys.

Try interacting with the parts you added!

When you're ready, press Stop to go back to editing your place.","values":{"en-us":"Control your avatar with the W, A, S & D keys.

Try interacting with the parts you added!

When you're ready, press Stop to go back to editing your place."}},{"key":"Studio.Tutorials.Tutorial.TopicNumber","source":"Topic %d of %d","values":{"en-us":"Topic %d of %d"}}]
